properties.description:
Reads a Specific Incident and block the hashes assosiated with the Incident in addition to isolate the source host of that incient. 
THe Process hashes are read from anyconnect integration with Stealtwhatch

properties.script:
import datetime

st ="$activity.definition_activity_01GKO73TGI93L4ZnkYwf2V5radHSpLmMH6z.output.variable_workflow_01GKNPP7JVPCE1pwHKORFctnwQ1SGbrIcsb$"
start= st[:len(st)-5]+st[len(st)-1]

ed=start[:len(start)-10]+' '+start[len(start)-9:]
ed2=ed[:len(ed)-1]

dt=  datetime.datetime.strptime(ed2,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')
st2= dt+datetime.timedelta(minutes=5)
st3= dt+datetime.timedelta(minutes=-5)

myenddate=datetime.datetime.strftime(st2,'%Y-%m-%d'+'T'+'%H:%M:%S'+'Z')
mystartdate=datetime.datetime.strftime(st3,'%Y-%m-%d'+'T'+'%H:%M:%S'+'Z')

input.variable_workflow_01DSFHCF8Z5CR27M0Gp2Kj: Automated SWE Incident Workflow :   SWE Event : $activity.definition_activity_01GKO73TGI93L4ZnkYwf2V5radHSpLmMH6z.output.variable_workflow_01GKNQ5RWQ6WP6dWIM7Q0Km5TvYikhJNVnT$   Source IP: $activity.definition_activity_01GKO73TGI93L4ZnkYwf2V5radHSpLmMH6z.output.variable_workflow_01GKNOS4D8LTK7ASaODVZD6MJ9rkUVH9DrX$  that triggered This Event   was Isolated. The - File Hash: $activity.definition_activity_01GKO77AE0M5J7VPAtev9ZVWFmGklE3Jhk5.output.variable_workflow_01GDWM9R9L1AH3BvwQLsBoI6qhvAupBXkXI$ Has been blocked. The DestinationIP: $activity.definition_activity_01GKO73TGI93L4ZnkYwf2V5radHSpLmMH6z.output.variable_workflow_01GKNP8ME2MVO6StQf6wAdBdbM3x4L2r9Ea$

properties.description:
Get a process hash for a conversation , require a flow search for a Source and Destination IP at a specific time Range. Start and End Date. 

Output is a List of Strings containg all the hashes

properties.script:
import json

results = $activity.definition_activity_01GDRA7WYRKRL6Q5e59U5AdlJ7NWFDu1rmM.output.response_body$["data"]["flows"]
processhasheslist = []
for i in range(len(results)):
       if  "processHash" in results[i]["subject"]:
            print(results[i]["subject"]["processHash"])
            processhasheslist.append(results[i]["subject"]["processHash"])

properties.name: Connector GUID
properties.description: Connector GUID of the computer to toggle isolation on

Enables isolation for a given computer by its connector GUID.

[] Get the computer's current isolation status
[] Check whether or not isolation is available for this computer
[]> If not, end the workflow as there's nothing more we can do

[] Check if the request failed and, if so, return an error
